c74object.name: nn.terrain.gui
c74object.digest: Graphic User Interface for Latent Terrain Synth
c74object.description: Graphic User Interface for Latent Terrain Synth

method.name: getcontent
method.digest: Get all trajectories in a dictionary
method.description: Get all trajectories in a dictionary

method.name: float
method.digest: Length of an audio sample (in ms) to be plotted along a trajectory
method.description: Length of an audio sample (in ms) to be plotted along a trajectory

method.name: dictionary
method.digest: Plot sampled interval of a terrain, or coordinates of trajectories (depending on the key name of the dictionary)
method.description: Plot sampled interval of a terrain, or coordinates of trajectories (depending on the key name of the dictionary)

method.name: list
method.digest: Length of audio samples (in ms) to be plotted along trajectories
method.description: Length of audio samples (in ms) to be plotted along trajectories

method.name: append
method.digest: Add an audio sample length (in ms) to be plotted along trajectories
method.description: Add an audio sample length (in ms) to be plotted along trajectories

attribute.name: interval
attribute.digest: The rate at which the display is updated
attribute.description: The rate at which the display is updated.

attribute.name: latent_length
attribute.digest: (list) Number of latents in each trajectory
attribute.description: (list) Number of latents in each trajectory

attribute.name: stylus_ink_color
attribute.digest: (color) colour of the drawing in the stylus mode
attribute.description: (color) colour of the drawing in the stylus mode

attribute.name: buffer_size
attribute.digest: (int) Buffer size when playing the trajectories
attribute.description: (int) Buffer size when playing the trajectories. Same values with the terrain and the autoencoder is suggested.

attribute.name: stylus_line_width
attribute.digest: (float) line width of the drawing in the stylus mode
attribute.description: (float) line width of the drawing in the stylus mode

attribute.name: latent_density
attribute.digest: Density of latents along a trajectory
attribute.description: Density of latents along a trajectory

attribute.name: values_boundary
attribute.digest: (float) value at the left, top, right, bottom of the canvas (values won't be clamped, it behaves more like a scale
attribute.description: (float) value at the left, top, right, bottom of the canvas (values won't be clamped, it behaves more like a scale.)

attribute.name: in_ratio
attribute.digest: (float) autoencoder's compression ratio in the time domain
attribute.description: (float) autoencoder's compression ratio in the time domain.

attribute.name: plot_resolution
attribute.digest: (int) 1~16, the resolution to display the terrain
attribute.description: (int) 1~16, the resolution to display the terrain

attribute.name: task
attribute.digest: The task to be performed on the UI
attribute.description: The task to be performed on the UI
